title: ProjectBridge Analysis Output v1.2
description: The contract between the ProjectBridge engine and all consumers (CLI, UI, export). v1.2 adds experience_level, portfolio_insights, and interview_topics.

schema_version.description: Schema version for forward compatibility between engine and UI.

strengths.description: Skills detected in both the developer context and job requirements.

gaps.description: Skills required by the job but missing from the developer context.

recommendations.description: Actionable project suggestions that address identified skill gaps.

experience_level.description: Inferred experience level: junior, mid, or senior.

portfolio_insights.description: Portfolio gap insights surfaced during analysis.

interview_topics.description: Common interview topics for gap skills.

description.description: Detailed explanation of what to build and why it demonstrates the target skills.

skills_addressed.description: Skills this project demonstrates. Maximum 3 to keep scope manageable.

estimated_scope.description: Relative effort indicator for the recommended project.

skill_context.description: Mentor-style explanation of why these skills matter for the target role. 2-3 sentences of career context.

message.description: Actionable insight message for the developer.

skill.description: The skill name these topics relate to.

topics.description: 2-3 common interview topics for this skill.
